meanings.definition: The degree to which something is successful in producing a desired result.
meanings.sent1: The effectiveness of the new medicine in treating headaches was remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The team measured the effectiveness of their marketing campaign by analyzing sales data.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand had an unexpected effectiveness in making objects disappear.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had an effectiveness that could brighten even the gloomiest of days.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's effectiveness in explaining complex concepts made learning easy and enjoyable.

meanings.definition: The power to produce a result.
meanings.sent1: The effectiveness of the engine was evident in its ability to propel the car forward.
meanings.sent2: The effectiveness of the cleaning product was proven by its ability to remove tough stains.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape seemed to have an extraordinary effectiveness in granting him superhuman abilities.
meanings.sent4: His words had an effectiveness that cut through the noise and reached the hearts of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The sun's effectiveness in providing light and warmth is essential for life on Earth.
